bwwExcerpt: Jeanine Tesori's music still resonates (the sharp-as-a-razor book is by Lisa Kron). Crowd-pleasing comic turns have Small Alison and her brothers (Oscar Williams and Zell Steele Morrow, both talented mop-tops) imagining a TV commercial for the 'Fun Home.' In a fantasy sequence, Lucas recasts the people in her orbit as members of The Partridge Family.
